Text:
"The story of The Medallion revolves round a son trying to get a mystical medallion back and at the same time take revenge for his fathers death. To achieve this he must train hard in order to become a real kungfu expert. 
But what happens if after his training he can't even beat his best friend... "

This is not the Jackie Chan movie but a swedish homemade kung-fu movie.

More information and trailer/photos can be found here: http://medallion.mine.nu/
